wikipedia_page.main: William Charles Wilde (24 September 1904 – 18 June 1976), known as Jimmy Wilde, was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League, for Crystal Palace, as a defender.

link_mentions.page: List of Crystal Palace F.C. players

response: Jimmy Wilde (1892–1969) was a Welsh professional boxer and world boxing champion.
Jimmy Wilde may also refer to:
* Jimmy Wilde (footballer, fl. 1914–23), English footballer for Burnley, Reading and Accrington Stanley
* Jimmy Wilde (footballer, born 1904) (1904–1976), English footballer for Crystal Palace
* Jimmy Wilde, one of the many pen names of John Creasey (1908–1973), English crime and science fiction writer
